verbs.description: [V: plan] [ARG1: to drastically curtail protests in dc quick thankyou update] this is just a quick message that needs some light shone upon it there a plan afoot to cut down on protests in dc including shutting down space in front of the white house charging massive fees and banning stages and sound systems for kos liberation league book lovers dmca brett kavanaugh senate florida dc senator kos kos media gop texas
